txt.en: 'My father once made a hefty profit trading on Rath Teraig, but now the goblins block the path!'
'Not all that glimmers is gold and not all that is sullied is without worth.'
'I sell fine gems but not to the likes of you. Check the hall of trade for what you seek.'
'Ah, the glint off the glacial lakes is like the fire in the heart of a diamond.'
